original: @240a rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @240a rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: she ka pra kri ya /
analyzed: she ka pra kri ya /
translated: ≈öekaprakriyƒÅ.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dbang gi rab tu byed pa /
analyzed: dbang gi rab tu byed pa /
translated: The Performance of Empowerment.

original: thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Great Compassionate Noble Avalokite≈õvara.

original: phab pa btang ba'i phyi nas mgo bo dang ni snying ga spyi gtsug rnams dang lte ba mgrin pa dang // gsang ba rnams su srung ba rgyal ba rnams kyis rang gi rigs gyur rnams la rang gi rdor gsum gyis //
analyzed: phab pa btang ba'i phyi nas mgo bo dang ni snying ga spyi gtsug rnams dang lte ba mgrin pa dang // gsang ba rnams su srung ba rgyal ba rnams kyis rang gi rigs gyur rnams la rang gi rdor gsum gyis //
translated: After the descent, at the head, heart, crown, navel, throat, and secret places, the Victors protect their own families with their own three vajras.

original: slob ma rnams kyi lus la gos ser bskon zhing mig rnams bkab nas dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya //
analyzed: slob ma rnams kyi lus la gos ser bskon zhing mig rnams bkab nas dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya //
translated: The disciples' bodies are covered with yellow cloth, their eyes are covered, and they are brought into this ma·πá·∏çala.

original: kun rdzob don du rab mchog lam nas gshegs nyid rnams la brtul zhugs rnams ni sbyin bya rtag pa ru //
analyzed: kun rdzob don du rab mchog lam nas gshegs nyid rnams la brtul zhugs rnams ni sbyin bya rtag pa ru //
translated: For the sake of the ultimate, the supreme path, the observances are always given to those who have gone for refuge.

original: gsad dang mi bden pa @240b dang gzhan gyi bud med rnams spangs de bzhin gzhan nor chang 'thung dag kyang ste //
analyzed: gsad dang mi bden pa @240b dang gzhan gyi bud med rnams spangs de bzhin gzhan nor chang 'thung dag kyang ste //
translated: Killing, untruth, others' wives, likewise others' property, and alcohol are abandoned.

original: 'khor ba'i rdo rje zhags pa rang gi dge ba 'joms par byed pa sdig pa lnga po 'di nyid rnams //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rdo rje zhags pa rang gi dge ba 'joms par byed pa sdig pa lnga po 'di nyid rnams //
translated: These five sins destroy one‚Äôs virtue, and are the vajra noose of sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: gang zhig gang gi dus su byung ba'i lha dang mi yi bla ma de yi ming gis rab tu sbyin byas pa'i //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi dus su byung ba'i lha dang mi yi bla ma de yi ming gis rab tu sbyin byas pa'i //
translated: Whatever sin you have committed at any time, give it a name, the name of the guru of gods and men.

original: sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' stsal 'di yis srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pas khyod rnams kyis kyang bskyang bar gyis /
analyzed: sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' stsal 'di yis srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pas khyod rnams kyis kyang bskyang bar gyis /
translated: By this command of the Lord of Variety, the fear of existence is destroyed. You should also protect it.

original: rgyan 'gyed kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min chos rnams dang // ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha dang mi rnams bla ma lnga ni gsad mi bya /
analyzed: rgyan 'gyed kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min chos rnams dang // ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha dang mi rnams bla ma lnga ni gsad mi bya /
translated: The five gurus of gods and men should not be killed: the guru who gives the initiation, the guru who gives the instructions, the guru who gives the reading transmission, the guru who gives the Dharma, and the guru who gives the name.

original: grogs dang rje bo dang ni lha mi'i bla ma dge 'dun dbugs 'byin rnams la 'khu ba dang // dbang po rnams kyis yongs su chags rnams min te srid pa'i bdag po'i brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o; ;dpal ldan sngags kyis mngon par bsngags pa lag pa'i padma kha sbyar du ni me tog gcig byin te //
analyzed: grogs dang rje bo dang ni lha mi'i bla ma dge 'dun dbugs 'byin rnams la 'khu ba dang // dbang po rnams kyis yongs su chags rnams min te srid pa'i bdag po'i brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o; ;dpal ldan sngags kyis mngon par bsngags pa lag pa'i padma kha sbyar du ni me tog gcig byin te //
translated: One should offer a flower in the lotus of one‚Äôs hand, consecrated with the glorious mantra,

original: dbang po lan gsum bskor te lag pa'i padma kha sbyar gnas pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor du ni ngor //
analyzed: dbang po lan gsum bskor te lag pa'i padma kha sbyar gnas pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor du ni ngor //
translated: and turn the flower three times above the head of the disciple, and then let it fall into the ma·πá·∏çala of the lotus of one‚Äôs hand.

original: gnas gyur gang du me tog bzang po lhung ba de nyid de yi rigs su des so mi bdag kye //
analyzed: gnas gyur gang du me tog bzang po lhung ba de nyid de yi rigs su des so mi bdag kye //
translated: Wherever the flower falls, that is the family of the disciple, O King.

original: phyi nas dbang bdun rnams dang rnam gsum 'dir ni ji lta ba bzhin bla med yang dag rab tu sbyin //üîΩklu rnams kyis sa ma bzhis te rgyal ba rnam rgyal bcas pa'i bum pa nor bu gser gyi bum pa'am //
analyzed: phyi nas dbang bdun rnams dang rnam gsum 'dir ni ji lta ba bzhin bla med yang dag rab tu sbyin // klu rnams kyis sa ma bzhis te rgyal ba rnam rgyal bcas pa'i bum pa nor bu gser gyi bum pa'am //
translated: Then one should bestow the seven empowerments and the three, in the proper manner, of the unsurpassed yoga.üîΩThe nƒÅgas should be worshipped with four oblations, and the disciple should be placed in the ma·πá·∏çala of the victorious and most victorious, in a vase made of jewels, gold,

original: sa las byung ba rnams su @241a *//
analyzed: sa las byung ba rnams su @241a *//
translated: or clay.

original: rin chen sman ldan dang ni dri ldan rnams kyis lha mo rnams kyis khrus bya'o //
analyzed: rin chen sman ldan dang ni dri ldan rnams kyis lha mo rnams kyis khrus bya'o //
translated: The goddesses bathe him with the jewels, the medicines, and the perfumes.

original: sangs rgyas rab dbye rnams kyis dbu rgyan sbyin te mchog gi bla mas nus ma rnams kyis dar dpyangs nyid //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rab dbye rnams kyis dbu rgyan sbyin te mchog gi bla mas nus ma rnams kyis dar dpyangs nyid //
translated: The Buddhas crown him with the diadem, and the supreme gurus with the streamers.

original: rdo rje dril bus nyi ma zla ba nyid de brtul zhugs kyis kyang yul dang dbang po sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bus nyi ma zla ba nyid de brtul zhugs kyis kyang yul dang dbang po sbyang bar bya //
translated: The vajra and the bell, the sun and the moon, are his by his observances, and by his observances he purifies the objects and the senses.

original: ming gis khro bo rnams dang byams sogs dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rjes gnang phyi mor bcas pa sbyin //
analyzed: ming gis khro bo rnams dang byams sogs dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rjes gnang phyi mor bcas pa sbyin //
translated: By his name he receives the permission of the wrathful ones, of the lords of the Victors, and of the mothers, with the tender love of Maitreya.

original: rdo rje dang ni dril bu rab tu sbyin nas mchog gi snying rjes dag pa'i chos rnams bstan par bya //
analyzed: rdo rje dang ni dril bu rab tu sbyin nas mchog gi snying rjes dag pa'i chos rnams bstan par bya //
translated: Having given him the vajra and the bell, he teaches him the pure Dharma with supreme compassion.

original: rdo rje'i rigs su nges pa srog gcod pa dang ral grir mi bden pa yi ngag brjod bya ba dang // rin chen du ni gzhan nor 'phrog dang mchog gi padma'i rigs nyid du yang gzhan gyi bud med 'phrog /
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs su nges pa srog gcod pa dang ral grir mi bden pa yi ngag brjod bya ba dang // rin chen du ni gzhan nor 'phrog dang mchog gi padma'i rigs nyid du yang gzhan gyi bud med 'phrog /
translated: In the Vajra family, he is initiated into killing and the sword; in the Ratna family, into lying and the lotus; in the Padma family, into stealing and the gem; and in the Karma family, into adultery and the consort.

original: 'khor lor 'chang dang mar me sangs rgyas rnams dang yul rnams mtha' dag shin tu bsten par bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'khor lor 'chang dang mar me sangs rgyas rnams dang yul rnams mtha' dag shin tu bsten par bya ba'o //
translated: The wheel is to be worn, the lamp is the Buddhas, and all objects are to be fully relied upon.

original: gri gug tu ni gdol pa mo la sogs pa bud med mtha' dag mkha' yi padma smad mi bya //
analyzed: gri gug tu ni gdol pa mo la sogs pa bud med mtha' dag mkha' yi padma smad mi bya //
translated: The flaying knife is all women, such as the untouchable woman, and the lotus of space is not to be despised.

original: sems can rnams kyi don du nor dang lus bcas sbyin gyi 'di ni khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ba min //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don du nor dang lus bcas sbyin gyi 'di ni khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ba min //
translated: For the sake of sentient beings, wealth and even the body are to be given, and this is not to be protected by you.

original: rigs kyi bu rnams gzhan du bskal ba grangs med pas kyang sangs rgyas min par rgyal bas gsungs par nges //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu rnams gzhan du bskal ba grangs med pas kyang sangs rgyas min par rgyal bas gsungs par nges //
translated: It is certain that the Victorious One has said that, O sons of good family, even in countless eons, one will not become a Buddha elsewhere.

original: chu yis sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams dang dbu rgyan rgyal ba rnams te dar dbyangs nus ma rnams //
analyzed: chu yis sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams dang dbu rgyan rgyal ba rnams te dar dbyangs nus ma rnams //
translated: The water is the goddesses such as TƒÅrƒÅ, the crown is the Victorious Ones, and the silk ribbons are the powerful ones.

original: rdo rje dril bus nyi zla dag dang brtul zhugs yul sogs rnams dang ming gis @241b byams pa sogs su sbyong //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bus nyi zla dag dang brtul zhugs yul sogs rnams dang ming gis @241b byams pa sogs su sbyong //
translated: The vajra and bell are the sun and moon, the pledges are the objects such as wine, and by the name one is purified as Maitreya and so forth.

original: rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal ldan srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor lo rjes khyab pa //
analyzed: rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal ldan srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor lo rjes khyab pa //
translated: The subsequent authorization is the glorious perfect enlightenment, the conqueror of the fears of existence, the all-pervading KƒÅlacakra.

original: de ltar dbang bdun rnams kyis sdig pa'i dri ma 'joms pas dkyil 'khor nyid du yang dag rab tu sbyin //
analyzed: de ltar dbang bdun rnams kyis sdig pa'i dri ma 'joms pas dkyil 'khor nyid du yang dag rab tu sbyin //
translated: Thus, the seven initiations are given in the ma·πá·∏çala, since they destroy the stains of sin.

original: dbang bdun rnams kyis dbang rnams bkur na dge ba'i dbang gis sa bdun dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dbang bdun rnams kyis dbang rnams bkur na dge ba'i dbang gis sa bdun dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
translated: If one is initiated with the seven initiations, one becomes a lord of the seven levels by the power of virtue.

original: phyis ni phyir mi ldog la sogs pa nges par rab tu 'jug pa bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i dbang //
analyzed: phyis ni phyir mi ldog la sogs pa nges par rab tu 'jug pa bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i dbang //
translated: Later, one definitely enters the irreversible stage, the vase and secret initiations.

original: shes rab ye shes dbang rnams bskur bas srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i 'jam dbyangs nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes dbang rnams bskur bas srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i 'jam dbyangs nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
translated: By the bestowal of the initiations of wisdom and knowledge, one becomes Ma√±jugho·π£a, who conquers the terrors of existence.

original: 'gro ba g-yo sgyu'i dbang gis rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na 'di nyid la yang dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gro ba g-yo sgyu'i dbang gis rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na 'di nyid la yang dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'gyur //
translated: If one commits a root downfall under the power of deceit, one will experience the sufferings of hell in this very life.

original: rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dbang bdun la gnas yon tan can gyis bzlas pas rnam par dag par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dbang bdun la gnas yon tan can gyis bzlas pas rnam par dag par 'gyur //
translated: If one commits a root downfall, one who possesses the qualities of abiding in the seven initiations becomes purified by repeating the initiations.

original: gal te bum pa dang ni gsang bar brtul zhugs nges pa'i dbang ste gong mar dag pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: gal te bum pa dang ni gsang bar brtul zhugs nges pa'i dbang ste gong mar dag pa yod ma yin //
translated: If there is no purification in the higher initiations, the initiations of the vase and the secret are the initiations of the vow of conduct.

original: gang zhig la ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dag par bya ba'i don du dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug bya //
analyzed: gang zhig la ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dag par bya ba'i don du dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug bya //
translated: He who has incurred a root downfall should enter this mandala in order to purify himself.

original: rjes gnang thob nas phyi nas tshogs kyi rigs su 'gro na rgan pa zhes pa las ni gzhon pa'o //
analyzed: rjes gnang thob nas phyi nas tshogs kyi rigs su 'gro na rgan pa zhes pa las ni gzhon pa'o //
translated: Having received the subsequent initiation, he should go to the family of the assembly. He is called ‚Äúyounger‚Äù in relation to one who is ‚Äúolder.‚Äù

original: rtsa ba'i ltung ba bu rnams kyis te dpal ldan bla ma'i thugs sun phyung ba ri bong 'dzin par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i ltung ba bu rnams kyis te dpal ldan bla ma'i thugs sun phyung ba ri bong 'dzin par 'gyur //
translated: The root downfalls are the sons, and the offense against the glorious guru is the rabbit.

original: de yi bka' las 'das pa gzhan te de bzhin du ni spun la khro ba gsum par nges par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi bka' las 'das pa gzhan te de bzhin du ni spun la khro ba gsum par nges par 'gyur //
translated: The transgression of his command is another, and likewise the anger toward a brother is ascertained as the third.

original: byams pa spangs pa bzhi par 'gyur te @242a *//
analyzed: byams pa spangs pa bzhi par 'gyur te @242a *//
translated: The abandonment of love is the fourth,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems nyid rab tu spangs pa las ni mda'//
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems nyid rab tu spangs pa las ni mda'//
translated: and furthermore, the complete abandonment of the spirit of enlightenment is the fifth.

original: grub mtha' smod pa drug pa nyid de gzhan yang ma smin skye bo rnams la gsang ba byin pa ri //
analyzed: grub mtha' smod pa drug pa nyid de gzhan yang ma smin skye bo rnams la gsang ba byin pa ri //
translated: The denigration of the conclusion is the sixth, and furthermore, the giving of the secret to an unripe person is the seventh.

original: phung po nyon mongs pa las klu ru 'gyur te gzhan yang dag pa'i chos la ma dad dgu pa'o //
analyzed: phung po nyon mongs pa las klu ru 'gyur te gzhan yang dag pa'i chos la ma dad dgu pa'o //
translated: The abandonment of the aggregates is the eighth, and the abandonment of the spirit of enlightenment is the ninth.

original: sgyu yi byams pa phyogs te ming sogs bral ba'i bde ba ster la rtog pa gang yin drag po'o //
analyzed: sgyu yi byams pa phyogs te ming sogs bral ba'i bde ba ster la rtog pa gang yin drag po'o //
translated: The fierce one is the thought of giving the bliss free from name, etc. , to the illusory beloved.

original: dag pa'i sems can rnams la rab tu skyon brjod nyi mar 'gyur ro dam tshig rnyed pa spangs na gzhan //
analyzed: dag pa'i sems can rnams la rab tu skyon brjod nyi mar 'gyur ro dam tshig rnyed pa spangs na gzhan //
translated: The sun is the thought of the pure beings, and the other is the thought of the impure beings.

original: bud med thams cad la smod nges par ma nur 'gyur te rdo rje theg pa la gnas rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: bud med thams cad la smod nges par ma nur 'gyur te rdo rje theg pa la gnas rnams kyi'o //
translated: The vajra vehicle is the thought of all women, and the other is the thought of the non-Buddhists.

original: phyogs kyi lo ni gcig nas rnam pa bcu yi bar du lta dang reg par bya ba yin pa ste //
analyzed: phyogs kyi lo ni gcig nas rnam pa bcu yi bar du lta dang reg par bya ba yin pa ste //
translated: The view and the touch are from one year up to ten years in the directions.

original: de nas 'khyud bya rnams ni rgya mtsho rnams dang ro bcas bsten par bya ba g-yo ba la sogs pa //
analyzed: de nas 'khyud bya rnams ni rgya mtsho rnams dang ro bcas bsten par bya ba g-yo ba la sogs pa //
translated: Then, the embraces are from the oceans up to the enjoyment of the corpse, in the moving, etc.

original: nyi shu'i lo yi 'og ma'i phyag rgya rnams ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo 'byung bo lha min rigs //
analyzed: nyi shu'i lo yi 'og ma'i phyag rgya rnams ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo 'byung bo lha min rigs //
translated: The mudras below the twenty years are the supreme Bhairava, Rudra, Asura, and Rakshasa.

original: dbang gi don du drug dang gsum gyis bde mnyam 'bras ster ba dang gzhan ni bsgom pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: dbang gi don du drug dang gsum gyis bde mnyam 'bras ster ba dang gzhan ni bsgom pa'i don du'o //
translated: The six and three are for the sake of the consecration, bestowing the fruit of the bliss of equality, and the other is for the sake of the meditation.

original: gang zhig dang por yang ni dpal ldan shes rab nu mar reg pa de nyid bum pa'i dbang du brjod //
analyzed: gang zhig dang por yang ni dpal ldan shes rab nu mar reg pa de nyid bum pa'i dbang du brjod //
translated: He who first touches the breast of the glorious Wisdom, that very one is said to be the vase empowerment.

original: ri bong 'dzin pa myangs dang gsang ba mthong bar byas pas gsang ba'i dbang du rab tu 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ri bong 'dzin pa myangs dang gsang ba mthong bar byas pas gsang ba'i dbang du rab tu 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Having tasted the rabbit-holder and having seen the secret, he becomes the secret empowerment.

original: mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyis yan lag kha rnams sbyang bar bya ste shes rab ye shes dbang sbyin bya //
analyzed: mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyis yan lag kha rnams sbyang bar bya ste shes rab ye shes dbang sbyin bya //
translated: The limbs of all the Victorious Ones are purified by the family, and the wisdom-knowledge empowerment is given.

original: rgyal ba dbang por @242b byas te slob ma'i don du phyag rgya sbyin dang gzhan yang bla ma la yang 'dir //
analyzed: rgyal ba dbang por @242b byas te slob ma'i don du phyag rgya sbyin dang gzhan yang bla ma la yang 'dir //
translated: Having made the Victorious One the lord, for the sake of the disciple, the seal is given, and also to the guru here.

original: rgyan rnams thams cad ldan pa'i gser zhun dang ni mtshungs pa'i lo nyid bcu gnyis ma ste bu mo mdzes //
analyzed: rgyan rnams thams cad ldan pa'i gser zhun dang ni mtshungs pa'i lo nyid bcu gnyis ma ste bu mo mdzes //
translated: The beautiful girl, endowed with all ornaments, is like molten gold, twelve years old.

original: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid ldan pas rang gi rdo rje nor bus spyad bya nyid ni chags bcas la //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid ldan pas rang gi rdo rje nor bus spyad bya nyid ni chags bcas la //
translated: By one endowed with the nature of method and wisdom, one's own vajra gem is to be enjoyed, along with passion.

original: slob ma dag pa shes nas rdo rje sa bon bcas pa khar ni yang dag gzhug par bya ba nyid //
analyzed: slob ma dag pa shes nas rdo rje sa bon bcas pa khar ni yang dag gzhug par bya ba nyid //
translated: Having known the pure disciple, together with the vajra seed, one should place it in the mouth.

original: phyis ni rang gi phyag rgya bu la byin par byas nas de nas gzhan yang du ba'i lam la sogs ldan yang //
analyzed: phyis ni rang gi phyag rgya bu la byin par byas nas de nas gzhan yang du ba'i lam la sogs ldan yang //
translated: Later, having given his seal to his son, he should give it to another.

original: skrag dang 'khrul pa'i sems dang g-yo dang gzhan gyi dbang du 'gro ba dang ni nad ldan bu btsas dang // khro ldan khengs shing 'dod la chags dang rdzun dang rtsod pa la dga' yan lag nyams dang ma dag pa //
analyzed: skrag dang 'khrul pa'i sems dang g-yo dang gzhan gyi dbang du 'gro ba dang ni nad ldan bu btsas dang // khro ldan khengs shing 'dod la chags dang rdzun dang rtsod pa la dga' yan lag nyams dang ma dag pa //
translated: One who is frightened, confused, deceitful, under the control of another, sick, having given birth, angry, arrogant, attached to desire, false, quarrelsome, with impaired limbs, impure,

original: de lta bu rnams shes rab ye shes dbang du shin tu 'bad de bla mas spang bya mi'i dpang po //
analyzed: de lta bu rnams shes rab ye shes dbang du shin tu 'bad de bla mas spang bya mi'i dpang po //
translated: such a person should be strenuously avoided by the guru in the empowerment of wisdom-knowledge.

original: sngar gsungs sangs rgyas bla ma dag la gus ldan dam tshig 'dzin la phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod par bya //
analyzed: sngar gsungs sangs rgyas bla ma dag la gus ldan dam tshig 'dzin la phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod par bya //
translated: One who has faith in the previously mentioned guru buddhas, who upholds the commitments, and who offers prostrations and worship,

original: 'gro ba rnams kyi rang gi yid nyid 'dod chags kyis ni 'khrugs par byed dang gang bar 'gyur ba nyid //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams kyi rang gi yid nyid 'dod chags kyis ni 'khrugs par byed dang gang bar 'gyur ba nyid //
translated: the mind of beings is disturbed by desire and becomes full.

original: yan lag mchog la gang ba las ni 'bar bas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu nas yang dag 'dzag pa nyid //
analyzed: yan lag mchog la gang ba las ni 'bar bas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu nas yang dag 'dzag pa nyid //
translated: From being full in the supreme branch, the blazing one melts the rabbit-holder and drips.

original: aodda dgug par rab tu byas pas mchog gi bde ba ster ba thig le thar pa gsum gyi mthar //
analyzed: aodda dgug par rab tu byas pas mchog gi bde ba ster ba thig le thar pa gsum gyi mthar //
translated: By the supreme practice of the summoning of the O·∏ç·∏çiyƒÅna, the giver of supreme bliss, the drop is the three liberations.

original: snang reg 'dus dang 'gyur dang bde ba rnams te dga' ba'i dbye pa la sogs pa yis de ltar ro //
analyzed: snang reg 'dus dang 'gyur dang bde ba rnams te dga' ba'i dbye pa la sogs pa yis de ltar ro //
translated: By the divisions of joy, etc., of appearance, touch, union, transformation, and bliss, it is so.

original: dang por yang ni mi rnams kun gyis mig gis bltas @243a *//
analyzed: dang por yang ni mi rnams kun gyis mig gis bltas @243a *//
translated: First, all people look with their eyes.

original: pa 'di yis 'dod chags 'khrugs pa dga' ba ste //
analyzed: pa 'di yis 'dod chags 'khrugs pa dga' ba ste //
translated: By this, the disturbance of passion is joy.

original: phyi nas gang ba rang gi lus la rab tu 'dus pa mchog tu dga' ba nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: phyi nas gang ba rang gi lus la rab tu 'dus pa mchog tu dga' ba nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Later, the filling of one‚Äôs body with the union is supreme joy.

original: 'bar ba yang dag rol pas rdo rje las ni padmar thig le 'dzag par dga' ba'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba yang dag rol pas rdo rje las ni padmar thig le 'dzag par dga' ba'o //
translated: The blazing and the perfect enjoyment are the drop falling from the vajra to the lotus, joy.

original: aodda rdo rje las ni thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru bde ba 'gyur byed lhan cig skyes dga'o //
analyzed: aodda rdo rje las ni thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru bde ba 'gyur byed lhan cig skyes dga'o //
translated: The drop from the O·∏ç·∏çiyƒÅna vajra to the end of the three drops is the bliss-inducing innate joy.

original: 'dod dang dga' dang g-yo ba dang ni mi 'gyur ba ste bzhi rnams kyis ni de yi sbyor ba gcig /
analyzed: 'dod dang dga' dang g-yo ba dang ni mi 'gyur ba ste bzhi rnams kyis ni de yi sbyor ba gcig /
translated: Desire, joy, movement, and immobility are the four of its single union.

original: gang ba nus pa dang ni skye ba nges par yin te mchog tu dga' ba nyid rnams gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: gang ba nus pa dang ni skye ba nges par yin te mchog tu dga' ba nyid rnams gnyis pa'o //
translated: The full is the power and the certainty of birth, the supreme joy itself, the second.

original: 'bar ba dang ni thig le dag dang yur ba dang ste khyad par dga' ba nyid rnams gsum pa'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba dang ni thig le dag dang yur ba dang ste khyad par dga' ba nyid rnams gsum pa'o //
translated: The blazing, the drop, the channel, the special joy itself, the third.

original: aodda dang ni sgra tsam nyid de gnyid dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid rnams bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: aodda dang ni sgra tsam nyid de gnyid dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid rnams bzhi pa'o //
translated: The odor, the mere sound, the sleep, the innate joy itself, the fourth.

original: sems kyis bsam par bya ba ma ste rig par bya zhing 'khyud pa yis ni sring mor 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sems kyis bsam par bya ba ma ste rig par bya zhing 'khyud pa yis ni sring mor 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The mind is to be contemplated, the sister is to be known and embraced.

original: rdo rje rab tu zhugs pa bu mor brjod de byed bcas shin tu bde ba de bzhin tsha mo'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rab tu zhugs pa bu mor brjod de byed bcas shin tu bde ba de bzhin tsha mo'o //
translated: The vajra is fully entered, the daughter is declared, the niece is likewise with activity and bliss.

original: thig le ltung ba chung mar 'gyur te chags bral gzhan gyi rigs su gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyid do //
analyzed: thig le ltung ba chung mar 'gyur te chags bral gzhan gyi rigs su gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyid do //
translated: The falling drop is the wife, the yoginƒ´ of another family is free of attachment.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' chad pa'i dngos //
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' chad pa'i dngos //
translated: Thus the six mudrƒÅs of the yogin are the realities of earth, water, fire, wind, space, and cessation.

original: chu skyes su ni rdo rje rab zhugs pa dang mer ni rlung dang thig le ma lhung rim pa ste //
analyzed: chu skyes su ni rdo rje rab zhugs pa dang mer ni rlung dang thig le ma lhung rim pa ste //
translated: The vajra enters the lotus, the wind and the drop do not fall in the fire, in stages.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor gsum gyi rab tu gsal bar nges par sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor gsum gyi rab tu gsal bar nges par sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Thus, the mudras of body, speech, and mind are ascertained to be very clear in the three yogas.

original: chags dang chags bral mtha' dang sngon du @243b bde ba dam pa'i gter ni sbyor bas go cha bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: chags dang chags bral mtha' dang sngon du @243b bde ba dam pa'i gter ni sbyor bas go cha bzhi pa'o //
translated: The supreme treasure of bliss, the end of attachment and non-attachment, is the fourth armor through union.

original: phyag rgya rnams la yum gyi mchog gyur rnam pa bcu po de ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'di'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya rnams la yum gyi mchog gyur rnam pa bcu po de ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'di'o //
translated: Those ten aspects of the supreme mother among the mudras are the face of the glorious guru.

original: rnam pa bdun dang rnam pa gsum ste bcu po 'di ni 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi dbang ste //
analyzed: rnam pa bdun dang rnam pa gsum ste bcu po 'di ni 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi dbang ste //
translated: Those ten aspects, seven and three, are the power of the relative truth of the world.

original: de ltar de bzhin yang bzhi pa zhes gsungs pas so //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin yang bzhi pa zhes gsungs pas so //
translated: Thus, it is also said to be the fourth.

original: bzhi pa ni /
analyzed: bzhi pa ni /
translated: The fourth is

original: gsum pa shes rab ye shes ma yin te /
analyzed: gsum pa shes rab ye shes ma yin te /
translated: not the wisdom knowledge empowerment,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bzhi pa zhes smras pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin yang zhes gsungs pas so //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bzhi pa zhes smras pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin yang zhes gsungs pas so //
translated: because it is said to be the fourth empowerment that transcends the world, and because it is said to be ‚Äúthus also.‚Äù

original: 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
translated: Here the Lord has said:

original: gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu mar reg pa nyid dang gzhan yang bdud rtsi myong dang 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu mar reg pa nyid dang gzhan yang bdud rtsi myong dang 'khyud pa'o //
translated: The one who touches the breast of Wisdom, and also tastes the nectar, and embraces.

original: shes rab dang ni 'dus pas byang chub sems nyid zhu ba skad cig ma bzhir bdud rtsir gyur pa gang //
analyzed: shes rab dang ni 'dus pas byang chub sems nyid zhu ba skad cig ma bzhir bdud rtsir gyur pa gang //
translated: The one who is united with Wisdom, the melting of the very Thought of Enlightenment, becomes nectar in four moments.

original: de rnams thams cad 'jig rten pa yi lam gyi rgyu ru snying rje mchog gis nges par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams thams cad 'jig rten pa yi lam gyi rgyu ru snying rje mchog gis nges par bstan pa'o //
translated: All of them are taught by the supreme compassion as the cause of the mundane path.

original: gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das dbang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po dam pa'i phyag rgya bzang dang rjes 'dus pa //
analyzed: gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das dbang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po dam pa'i phyag rgya bzang dang rjes 'dus pa //
translated: The one who is supramundane, the Lord of the Conquerors, is united with the good seal of the holy one.

original: las kyi phyag rgya dri ma dang bcas sems g-yang byed de ye shes phyag rgya rnam par rtog yin pas //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya dri ma dang bcas sems g-yang byed de ye shes phyag rgya rnam par rtog yin pas //
translated: The action seal is defiled, the mind wavering; the wisdom seal is conceptual.

original: yang dag spangs te rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur ni rgyal mchog skyed byed phyag rgya bzang po sgom pa ni //
analyzed: yang dag spangs te rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur ni rgyal mchog skyed byed phyag rgya bzang po sgom pa ni //
translated: Having abandoned them, the meditation on the good seal which generates the cause of perfect enlightenment is the supreme Victor.

original: gos pa med cing mi 'gyur mun 'joms kun la khyab pa mkha' mtshungs rnal 'byor ma yi go bya ba //
analyzed: gos pa med cing mi 'gyur mun 'joms kun la khyab pa mkha' mtshungs rnal 'byor ma yi go bya ba //
translated: Unstained, unchanging, destroying darkness, pervading all, like space, is the understanding of the yoginis.

original: lus la gnas pa'i ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor los rjes khyab pas //
analyzed: lus la gnas pa'i ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor los rjes khyab pas //
translated: The wisdom that abides in the body, the splendor that destroys the stains of existence, is pervaded by the wheel of time.

original: sems @244a *// kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bur nges //
analyzed: sems @244a *// kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bur nges //
translated: It is merely an appearance of the mind, born from one‚Äôs own mind, like a reflection in a mirror.

original: ma lus rgyal sras rnams dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bsten byas na //
analyzed: ma lus rgyal sras rnams dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bsten byas na //
translated: When the lords of yoga, the bodhisattvas, and the buddhas rely on it,

original: ye shes snang ba de nyid rab tu shar bas bdud dpung yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag bsregs ba dang // chags pa la sogs rnams kyis rnal 'byor ba rnams lus la lo gcig sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed //
analyzed: ye shes snang ba de nyid rab tu shar bas bdud dpung yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag bsregs ba dang // chags pa la sogs rnams kyis rnal 'byor ba rnams lus la lo gcig sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed //
translated: the appearance of wisdom arises, burning all the armies of demons and their objects, and through the practice of a year, desire and so on bestow the bliss of union on the yogis.

original: shes rab ye shes zhes pa sems kyi snang ba nyid de yang rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes zhes pa sems kyi snang ba nyid de yang rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The so-called wisdom of wisdom is the appearance of the mind, which also has ten aspects.

original: dbang 'dir zhugs pa gang zhig dri ma med pa'i ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bur nges //
analyzed: dbang 'dir zhugs pa gang zhig dri ma med pa'i ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bur nges //
translated: Whoever enters this initiation is certain to be like the stainless moon, a reflection in a mirror.

original: de nas bde ba 'dzag pa med pa lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med bzhi pa mya ngan 'das par reg /
analyzed: de nas bde ba 'dzag pa med pa lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med bzhi pa mya ngan 'das par reg /
translated: Then, the bliss that does not drip, the innate, the unchanging, is touched as nirvana.

original: des na sangs rgyas zhal ni gang gi thugs dang zhal la gnas pa de nyid dpal ldan bla ma'o //
analyzed: des na sangs rgyas zhal ni gang gi thugs dang zhal la gnas pa de nyid dpal ldan bla ma'o //
translated: Therefore, the face of the Buddha, which abides in the mind and face of that [bliss], is the glorious guru.

original: nam mkhar chags pa'i sems kyis mig mi 'dzum pa dang ni rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs rnams kyis //
analyzed: nam mkhar chags pa'i sems kyis mig mi 'dzum pa dang ni rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs rnams kyis //
translated: With the mind focused in space, the eyes unclosed, and the vajra path fully entered,

original: stong pa las ni du pa smig rgyu rab tu gsal ba dri med srin bu me khyer mar me dang // 'bar dang nyi ma zla ba rdo rje rnams kyang gzhan yang mchog gi cha dang thig le nyid rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa las ni du pa smig rgyu rab tu gsal ba dri med srin bu me khyer mar me dang // 'bar dang nyi ma zla ba rdo rje rnams kyang gzhan yang mchog gi cha dang thig le nyid rnams so //
translated: from emptiness, the mirage, the shimmering, the stainless, the fireflies, the lamp, the flame, the sun, the moon, the vajra, and also the supreme part and the bindu itself

original: de yi dbus su sangs rgyas sku ni yul dang rnam par bral ba longs spyod rdzogs sku du ma'o //
analyzed: de yi dbus su sangs rgyas sku ni yul dang rnam par bral ba longs spyod rdzogs sku du ma'o //
translated: are in the middle of that, the form of the Buddha, free from objects, the manifold sambhogakaya.

original: chu 'dzin bral ba'i mkha' la snang ba rnal 'byor rtse @244b gcig gnas pa'i lta bas blta bar bya ba ni //
analyzed: chu 'dzin bral ba'i mkha' la snang ba rnal 'byor rtse @244b gcig gnas pa'i lta bas blta bar bya ba ni //
translated: The yogi who is in the state of one-pointedness should look at the vision in the sky free from clouds with the view.

original: ji srid nges par ri mo nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba mthong ba dus kyi rtsa yis so //
analyzed: ji srid nges par ri mo nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba mthong ba dus kyi rtsa yis so //
translated: As long as he sees the black lines, the stainless light-rays, the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ of time.

original: der ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku ni chu nang nyi ma bzhin du rnyog pa med pa sna tshogs mdog /
analyzed: der ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku ni chu nang nyi ma bzhin du rnyog pa med pa sna tshogs mdog /
translated: There, the body of the Omniscient One, like the sun in water, is stainless and multicolored.

original: yul dang rnam par bral ba'i rnam pa'i rnam pa ma lus rang gi sems te gzhan gyi sems nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: yul dang rnam par bral ba'i rnam pa'i rnam pa ma lus rang gi sems te gzhan gyi sems nyid ma yin no //
translated: The object of the mind is the mind itself, not the mind of another.

original: sku mthong gyur nas nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung nyid rab tu dgag par byas pa dang // brtul zhugs can rnams lam gyi sems ni zla ba drug gis reg bya bral nas bde mnyam 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sku mthong gyur nas nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung nyid rab tu dgag par byas pa dang // brtul zhugs can rnams lam gyi sems ni zla ba drug gis reg bya bral nas bde mnyam 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Having seen the body, the life-force vƒÅyu is blocked at the time of each day, and the yogƒ´ touches the mind of the path with the mind of the path, free from the tactile object, in six months.

original: ji srid nges par rang gi lus la 'od zer 'khor los yongs su 'khor bar byed pa mthong ba'i bar //
analyzed: ji srid nges par rang gi lus la 'od zer 'khor los yongs su 'khor bar byed pa mthong ba'i bar //
translated: As long as one definitely sees the light-rays circling one‚Äôs body with a wheel,

original: chags dang chags bral mtha' dang dang por song ba'i skad cig ma nas khyab bdag dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo //
analyzed: chags dang chags bral mtha' dang dang por song ba'i skad cig ma nas khyab bdag dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo //
translated: From the first moment of the end of passion and the end of freedom, the number of breaths of the all-pervading Lord increases.

original: mtha' dag 'bar ba'i dbus kyang khyad par dga' dang lhan cig skyes dang ye shes dang ni rnam shes dang // gnyid dang brgyal ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i rdo rje padma dag gis gnyis sbyor bde ba gang yin pa //
analyzed: mtha' dag 'bar ba'i dbus kyang khyad par dga' dang lhan cig skyes dang ye shes dang ni rnam shes dang // gnyid dang brgyal ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i rdo rje padma dag gis gnyis sbyor bde ba gang yin pa //
translated: The middle of the blazing of all, the middle of the special joy, the innate, the intuition, and the consciousness, the middle of sleep and fainting, the bliss of the union of the two by means of the vajra and the lotus,

original: de yis 'phel bar rab tu bya ba bla ma'i nges pa'i stobs kyis 'di nyid 'phel bar the tshom med //
analyzed: de yis 'phel bar rab tu bya ba bla ma'i nges pa'i stobs kyis 'di nyid 'phel bar the tshom med //
translated: by that, the increase should be done. By the power of the guru's certainty, there is no doubt that this increases.

original: bdud dang nyon mongs 'joms shing rgyal ba'i bdag po la gnas rnal 'byor pa yis lo gcig sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: bdud dang nyon mongs 'joms shing rgyal ba'i bdag po la gnas rnal 'byor pa yis lo gcig sbyor ba yis //
translated: The yogi who abides in the state of the conqueror, the lord, who conquers the demons and afflictions,

original: sa yi rnam par snang yang sra ba min dang chu yi gzugs su snang yang chu min gsher ba med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sa yi rnam par snang yang sra ba min dang chu yi gzugs su snang yang chu min gsher ba med pa'i phyir //
translated: appears in the form of earth, but is not solid; appears in the form of water, but is not watery, because it is without moisture;

original: me yi rnam par snang yang me min rlung @245a *//
analyzed: me yi rnam par snang yang me min rlung @245a *//
translated: appears in the form of fire, but is not fire;üîΩappears in the form of wind, but is not wind.

original: gi gzugs su snang yang g-yo ba med pas rlung ma yin //
analyzed: gi gzugs su snang yang g-yo ba med pas rlung ma yin //
translated: Although it appears in the form of the moon, it is not the wind, because it is motionless.

original: stong ba'i rnam pa yin yang mthong ste dkar dang sngo ba la sogs mthong yang sna tshogs kha dog min //
analyzed: stong ba'i rnam pa yin yang mthong ste dkar dang sngo ba la sogs mthong yang sna tshogs kha dog min //
translated: Although it is seen in the form of emptiness, it is not a variety of colors, because it is seen as white, blue, and so on.

original: rnam pa kun ldan yin yang mi mthong rang sems dri ma nyon mongs dang ni bdud kyi mthu stobs kyis //
analyzed: rnam pa kun ldan yin yang mi mthong rang sems dri ma nyon mongs dang ni bdud kyi mthu stobs kyis //
translated: Although it possesses all aspects, it is not seen, because of the stains of one‚Äôs mind, the power of the afflictions, and the power of MƒÅra.

original: sgra tsam thig la cha dang ye shes rnams ni bdud rtsi gnas su 'gro dang lcags sgrog bcings pa'i rtsa //
analyzed: sgra tsam thig la cha dang ye shes rnams ni bdud rtsi gnas su 'gro dang lcags sgrog bcings pa'i rtsa //
translated: The mere sound, the bindu, the parts, and the pristine consciousnesses go to the place of the am·πõta, and the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s are bound by the chains.

original: srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams nas rdo rje padmar bcas dang padma rdo rje ldan pa yis //
analyzed: srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams nas rdo rje padmar bcas dang padma rdo rje ldan pa yis //
translated: The three nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of the life-force and the evacuative [winds] are the vajra and lotus, and the lotus and vajra.

original: dbus su rlung dag 'gro dang 'jug pa yang dag 'dus pa yul can med par 'gyur ba dang // du ba la sogs mtshan ma rnams ni gang zhig gzungs dang 'di rnams 'dzin pa thams cad gsang ba chen po'o //
analyzed: dbus su rlung dag 'gro dang 'jug pa yang dag 'dus pa yul can med par 'gyur ba dang // du ba la sogs mtshan ma rnams ni gang zhig gzungs dang 'di rnams 'dzin pa thams cad gsang ba chen po'o //
translated: The winds that move and enter in the middle are gathered, and the sign of smoke, and so on, is the great secret of all those who hold the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´.

original: dbus su srog gzhug pa ni nyi ma dang bcas zla bar gyur pa gams dang g-yon pa bcing ba dang // phyag rgya dang ni sbyor ba'i sems kyis mchog tu bde gyur pa dang rdo rje yang dag sad pa dang // bde ba dam pa'i don du padmar rdo rje bskyod dam rang gi lag pa'i padmas gsor ba yis //
analyzed: dbus su srog gzhug pa ni nyi ma dang bcas zla bar gyur pa gams dang g-yon pa bcing ba dang // phyag rgya dang ni sbyor ba'i sems kyis mchog tu bde gyur pa dang rdo rje yang dag sad pa dang // bde ba dam pa'i don du padmar rdo rje bskyod dam rang gi lag pa'i padmas gsor ba yis //
translated: The life-force is placed in the center, the sun together with the moon, the binding of the right and left, and the supreme bliss through the mind united with the consort, and the perfect awakening of the vajra, and the shaking of the vajra in the lotus for the sake of the highest bliss, or the shaking with one's own lotus hand.

original: sa bon ma btang bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal nyid do //
analyzed: sa bon ma btang bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal nyid do //
translated: Without releasing the seed, that bliss is the face of the glorious guru, the conqueror of the fear of death.

original: sa ni chu la 'jug 'gyur chu yang me la de bzhin me ni rlung la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sa ni chu la 'jug 'gyur chu yang me la de bzhin me ni rlung la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The earth enters into the water, the water into the fire, and likewise the fire enters into the wind.

original: rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa mtshan ma rnam pa bcur 'gyur mtshan ma rnam pa kun ldan du //
analyzed: rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa mtshan ma rnam pa bcur 'gyur mtshan ma rnam pa kun ldan du //
translated: The wind is in the emptiness, and the emptiness becomes the ten aspects of the signs, and the one endowed with all aspects does not change.

original: rnam pa kun ldan mi 'gyur bde ba dam pa @245b gzhom du med pa ye shes sku ru 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa kun ldan mi 'gyur bde ba dam pa @245b gzhom du med pa ye shes sku ru 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The indestructible, supreme bliss becomes the wisdom body.

original: mi yi bdag po ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub 'gyur ro skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'dir //
analyzed: mi yi bdag po ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub 'gyur ro skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'dir //
translated: The lord of men, by the power of knowledge, becomes a magician, a Siddha.

original: 'dod pas sprul pa'i sku ru nges par 'gyur te gang ba rdzogs pa gsung du rab tu 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pas sprul pa'i sku ru nges par 'gyur te gang ba rdzogs pa gsung du rab tu 'gyur ba'o //
translated: By the power of desire, he becomes a NirmƒÅ·πáakƒÅya, a speaker of the perfect word.

original: 'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te aoddam las ni mchog tu bde bar mdzad pa'i ye shes zhes su brjod //
analyzed: 'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te aoddam las ni mchog tu bde bar mdzad pa'i ye shes zhes su brjod //
translated: The blazing one is the mind of manifestation, O·∏ç·∏çiyƒÅna, the knowledge that brings supreme bliss.

original: dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' khyad par dga' dang bcas pa dag gi rim pa yis //
analyzed: dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' khyad par dga' dang bcas pa dag gi rim pa yis //
translated: Joy is the SƒÅmbhogakƒÅya, supreme joy and special joy in sequence.

original: gsung dang thugs te lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba sogs las ye shes rdo rje la sogs 'byung bar byed //
analyzed: gsung dang thugs te lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba sogs las ye shes rdo rje la sogs 'byung bar byed //
translated: Speech and mind, the joy of innate union, give rise to the knowledge vajra and so forth.

original: g-yo ba nges par chos kyi sku ste srid gsum phyag byas pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yi gsung //
analyzed: g-yo ba nges par chos kyi sku ste srid gsum phyag byas pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yi gsung //
translated: Motion is the DharmakƒÅya, the speech of the one who is worshipped in the three worlds.

original: gnyid ni nges par chos kyi thugs te turya de yi ye shes nyid yin srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms //
analyzed: gnyid ni nges par chos kyi thugs te turya de yi ye shes nyid yin srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms //
translated: Sleep is the DharmakƒÅya mind, the TuryƒÅ, the knowledge that conquers the fear of existence.

original: yi ge nges par dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le sgra tsam rim pa yis //
analyzed: yi ge nges par dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le sgra tsam rim pa yis //
translated: The body of the syllable, definitely pure, is the part free from vowels, and the mere sound of the bindu, in stages.

original: gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje srid pa rnam gsum la gnas dag pa'i sku ru skyed par byed //
analyzed: gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje srid pa rnam gsum la gnas dag pa'i sku ru skyed par byed //
translated: Speech, mind, and gnosis vajras are generated in the body of the pure state of the three existences.

original: sad dang rmi lam rang bzhin dag dang gzhan yang de bzhin gnyid log pa dang tu rya'i rang bzhin rnams //
analyzed: sad dang rmi lam rang bzhin dag dang gzhan yang de bzhin gnyid log pa dang tu rya'i rang bzhin rnams //
translated: The nature of the waking state, dreams, and so on, likewise, the nature of sleep and sexual union,üîΩthe dissolution of the body and breath, the dissolution of the mind that is not moved by objects and causes,

original: lus gnas pa dang dbugs nyid thim pa rnam par rgyu dang yul las bskyod pa med pa'i sems thim pa; ;ye shes gnas kyang bud mad dang ni rab 'dus pa las byang chub sems zhu gyur pa'i skad cig ni //
analyzed: lus gnas pa dang dbugs nyid thim pa rnam par rgyu dang yul las bskyod pa med pa'i sems thim pa; ;ye shes gnas kyang bud mad dang ni rab 'dus pa las byang chub sems zhu gyur pa'i skad cig ni //
translated: and the instant the bodhicitta melts from the union with the consort in the place of gnosis,

original: sprul pa la sogs rim pas thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi ru nges par rab tu @246a *//
analyzed: sprul pa la sogs rim pas thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi ru nges par rab tu @246a *//
translated: the emanation, and so on, definitely transform into the four aspects of the mind vajra, in stages.

original: 'gyur ba'o // de ltar sems ni rnam pa bzhi rnams srid pa rnam gsum gyur pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus //
analyzed: 'gyur ba'o // de ltar sems ni rnam pa bzhi rnams srid pa rnam gsum gyur pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus //
translated: Thus, the mind, in four aspects, is in the center of the bindu of living beings in the three existences.

original: khyab byed bde mnyam 'bras ster thar pa'i rgyu ru rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bsrung bar bya ba ni //
analyzed: khyab byed bde mnyam 'bras ster thar pa'i rgyu ru rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bsrung bar bya ba ni //
translated: The lords of yoga protect the seed, the cause of liberation, which bestows the bliss of universal pervasion and the fruit of equality.

original: rnal 'byor rnams la mchog gi bde ba bskyed par sa bon thig le btang na thar par ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnams la mchog gi bde ba bskyed par sa bon thig le btang na thar par ga la 'gyur //
translated: How can there be liberation if the seed, the bindu, is emitted, which generates the supreme bliss of the yogis?

original: de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba skad cig ma 'di brtul zhugs can rnams kyis ni rgyun du spang bar bya //
analyzed: de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba skad cig ma 'di brtul zhugs can rnams kyis ni rgyun du spang bar bya //
translated: Therefore, this momentary bliss of cyclic existence should always be abandoned by those who are disciplined.

original: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshigs su bcad pa sum cu lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig pa las mdor bsdus pa dbang gi rab tu byed pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshigs su bcad pa sum cu lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig pa las mdor bsdus pa dbang gi rab tu byed pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The chapter on initiation, a summary of the one thousand and thirty verses of the glorious Wheel of Time Tantra, is complete.

original: rgya gar gyi pandi ta mkhas pa chen po sa manta shr'i dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi pandi ta mkhas pa chen po sa manta shr'i dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
translated: It was translated, edited, and finalized by the great Indian scholar Samantabhadra and the Tibetan translator and monk Ch√∂rap.
